main event: A witness spotted a white, red, and green flashing light crossing the sky in Covington, Ohio on November 23, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes.
The object was described as a white, red and green flashing light.
The object was moving due east.
No photographs were taken of the object.
The conclusion was that the sighting was a probable aircraft.
sighted object: white, red and green flashing light
